means: 拒不服从的，违抗法院命令的

sentence.Network_en: On his refusal to appear in person or by his attorney, he was pronounced contumacious.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于他拒绝亲自出庭或派他的律师出庭, 被宣布为抗传.

sentence.Network_en: There is another efficacious method for subduing the most obstinate, contumacious sinner.
sentence.Network_cn: 有另一个有效的方法来镇压那最为顽固 、 抗命不从的罪人.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 2013年5月29日 - (节制情感的,大陆)自己,你最好辅助他,要是他contumacious(不听令的)胆敢 contravene(违反)你的authority,你就replace/supplant了他,让他把皇位demise(.
contumacy n．抗命，不服从contumacious adj．违抗的，不服从的contumely n．无礼，傲慢
unassuming 谦逊的，不摆架子的contumacious 不听命令的，顽固的-
control 实验对照组contumacious 违抗的，不服从的conundrum 谜语

list.abs: 英语词汇新译 C_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... contumacious 不听令的 contumacy 藐视法庭 contumelious 傲慢的.
controvert v．反驳，驳斥contumacy n．抗命，不服从contumacious adj．违抗的，不服从的

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Latin contumax, contumac- (perhaps from con- 'with' + tumere 'swell') + -ious

sentences.sentence: "a contumaceous witness is subject to punishment"
